title: Opquast desktop
creator: Opquast
description: Firefox plugin to test more than 450 tests on quality, seo, accessibility, performance. You can also add comment when you found bugs and export your result in a cvs file or to your projets in opquast.reporting.com
guideline: WCAG 2.0 — W3C Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.0
<abbr lang="fr" title="Référentiel Général d’Accessibilité pour les Administrations">RGAA</abbr>, French government standard
